definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Many higher-priced, high-fidelity earphones can sound harsh playing digital music.
sentences.chinese: 很多更高价的高保真耳机听数码音乐时会刺耳。

sentences.english: I've gotten interested in hi-fi. I'm building my own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我对高保真收音机发生了乐趣，我正在自己装置一台。

sentences.english: In the end I found out what was wrong with my hifi.
sentences.chinese: 我终于搞清楚我的高保真音响出了什么毛病。

sentences.english: Such as high-fidelity audio aeronautical mobile satellite communications.
sentences.chinese: 如高保真的卫星航空移动音频通信。

sentences.english: Hi-fi stereo sound in a fashionable and innovative design.
sentences.chinese: 高保真立体声系统，设计时尚且有创意。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that the algorithm has better robustness and fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果证明该算法具有较好的鲁棒性和高保真性。

sentences.english: In this paper, the theory and design methods of digital audio signal processor for digital recorder (DAT. DCC)are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文以高保真数字音频信号处理器的设计为核心。

sentences.english: I've got interested in hi-fi . I'm building my own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我对高保真收音机发生了爱好，我正在自己装配一台。

sentences.english: The silver-plating of both screens makes it possible to perceive even the most subtle musical variations in the high-frequency range with hi-fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 镀银设计使得音乐的高频微小变化完全高保真展现。

definition: sound/acoustics/audio/hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. for 組合音響|组合音响[zu3 he2 yin1 xiang3]
the feeling of actually being there
loudspeaker box/speaker (audio equipment)/resonating chamber of a musical instrument/sound box
